channel.description: Recent content in Emacs on vyorkin.org

item.title: Writing an Emacs major mode for the Tiger language
item.description: References Link to heading There is a really good tutorial by Xah Lee: Emacs Lisp How to Write Major Mode, which I highly recommend reading.

item.title: My first Emacs package: ormolu.el
item.description: Intro Link to heading I’ve been using Emacs on a daily basis for about 2 years already, Ormolu is an opinionated zero-configuration formatter for Haskell source code built in Tweag.
